src:
Kepengurusan Anyar PSSI Terpilih, Ini Tanggapan Madura United
02 Nov 2019, 18:43 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajemen Madura United angkat bicara soal terpilihnya kepengurusan anyar PSSI. Laskar Sapeh Kerrab, julukan Madura United, menilai bahwa kepengurusan ini memiliki tugas besar yang sudah menanti untuk dituntaskan.
"Proses kongres sudah berjalan sesuai dengan tatib," ucap Direktur Utama PT Polana Bola Madura Bersatu (PT PBMB), Ziaul Haq.
"Saat ini, pengurus yang baru -dalam hal ini Ketum, Waketum dan Exco- punya tugas besar,"sambungnya.
Menurut Zia, tugas kepengurusan anyar tersebut antara lain adalah mempersiapkan gelaran Piala Dunia U20, meningkatkan kualitas kompetisi, dan juga pengelolaan Timnas Indonesia.
"Untuk Timnas, tentunya kualitas terbaik pemain akan didapatkan sepanjang kompetisi dan pola pengembangan pembinaan berjalan dengan baik," tuturnya.
Sebelumnya, Iwan Bule dipastikan terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI. Dalam pemilihan di ajang Kongres Luar Biasa, yang digelar di Jakarta, Sabtu (02/11/2019), ia menang telak dari para pesaingnya.
Pada pemilihan ini, dari 85 voter, Iwan mendapat 82 suara. Sementara, Arif Putra Wicaksono dan para calon lainnya tak mendapat satu pun suara. Tiga suara lain dianggap tidak sah.
Pemilihan Ketua Umum ini sendiri hanya diikuti tiga calon saja. Selain Iwan Bule, ada sosok Arif Putra Wicaksono dan Rahim Soekasah. Sementara, tujuh calon lain -termasuk La Nyalla Mattalitti- sudah mengundurkan diri.
Sebagai pendamping Ketua Umum, terpilihlah Iwan Budianto dan Cucu Somantri sebagai wakil. Iwan mendapat 74 suara, sedangkan Cucu mendapat 81 suara.
Simak artikel selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Anyar PSSI Management Chosen, This Is Madura United's Response
02 Nov 2019, 18:43 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Madura United's management has spoken of the election of the new PSSI management. Laskar Sapeh Kerrab, nicknamed Madura United, considers that the management has a large task that is waiting to be completed.
"The congress process has proceeded according to the Standing Orders," said President Director of PT Polana Bola Madura Bersatu (PT PBMB), Ziaul Haq.
"At the moment, the new management - in this case Ketum, Waketum and Exco - has a big task," he continued.
According to Zia, the new management duties include preparing for the U20 World Cup, improving the quality of competition, and also managing the Indonesian national team.
"For the national team, of course the best quality of players will be obtained throughout the competition and the pattern of coaching development goes well," he said.
Previously, Iwan Bule was certain to be elected as the General Chair of PSSI. In the election at the Extraordinary Congress event, which was held in Jakarta, Saturday (02/11/2019), he won a landslide victory over his competitors.
In this election, from 85 voters, Iwan got 82 votes. Meanwhile, Arif Putra Wicaksono and the other candidates did not get any votes. Three other votes are considered invalid.
The election of the Chairperson itself was only followed by three candidates. In addition to Iwan Bule, there are figures of Arif Putra Wicaksono and Rahim Soekasah. Meanwhile, seven other candidates - including La Nyalla Mattalitti - have resigned.
As a companion to the General Chair, Iwan Budianto and Cucu Somantri were chosen as representatives. Iwan got 74 votes, while Cucu got 81 votes.
Check out the full article below.
